text: Zhexie ren jiushi an la ceng ciyu enhui de xianzhimen. Tamen shuyu a dan de houyi, shuyu wo shi qi yu nu ha yiqi cheng chuan zhe de houyi, shuyu yi bu la xin he yiselie de houyi, shuyu wo suoyindao he xuanze de ren. Dang youren xiang tamen songdu pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de qishi shi, tamen dou baidao koutou he kuqi. Koutou chu
